great so you will not be root
once you do sudo su, you become root, then you no longer need sudo as long as you are root
you should not be able to use su
su expects the root's password, which you do not know
if you want to be root, you have to do sudo su, not su
it looks like you are not in the sudoers list
you might have to reboot, go to the recovery boot option, drop as root and add yourself to sudoers
you won't be able to do it from your account, you will have to drop into the root shell through the recovery
as i said you won't be able to edit/save that file
